py_sim.dynamics.single_integrator module¶

single_integrator.py: Defines types, functions, and classes for controlling a point with single integrator dynamics (i.e., direct control of the velocity)

class py_sim.dynamics.single_integrator.ConstantInputParams(v_d: TwoDimArray)¶

Bases: object

Parameters required for defining a constant velocity

v_d¶

Desired constant input

Type:

TwoDimArray

class py_sim.dynamics.single_integrator.PointInput(vec: TwoDimArray)¶

Bases: object

Defines the inputs for a single integrator system

input¶

A vector of inputs

Type:

NDArray[Any]

n_inputs¶

The number of inputs (i.e., rows in input)

Type:

int

vec¶

The vector storing the input (input reads from vec)

Type:

TwoDimArray

property input: ndarray[Any, dtype[Any]]¶

Returns the control input

n_inputs: int = 2¶
class py_sim.dynamics.single_integrator.SingleIntegratorParams(v_max: float = inf)¶

Bases: object

Defines the attributes for the single integrator dynamics

v_max¶

Maximum velocity of any individual component

Type:

NDArray[Any]

class py_sim.dynamics.single_integrator.VectorParams(v_max: float)¶

Bases: object

Parameters required for defining a constant velocity

v_max¶

Maximum velocity

Type:

float

py_sim.dynamics.single_integrator.const_control(time: float, state: TwoDArrayType, dyn_params: SingleIntegratorParams, cont_params: ConstantInputParams) → PointInput¶

Implements a constant control for the single integrator dynamics

Parameters:

  • time – clock time (not used)

  • state – vehicle state (not used)

  • dyn_params – The parameters for the dynamics

  • cont_params – The paramters for the control law

py_sim.dynamics.single_integrator.dynamics(state: TwoDArrayType, control: PointInput, params: SingleIntegratorParams) → TwoDimArray¶

Calculates single integrator dynamics.

The returned time derivative corresponds to

d/dt x d/dt y

Parameters:

  • state – The current position of the vehicle

  • control – The current input (velocities)

  • params – The parameters for the dynamics

Returns:

The resulting state time derivative (actually the input)

Return type:

TwoDimArray

py_sim.dynamics.single_integrator.vector_control(time: float, state: TwoDArrayType, vec: TwoDimArray, dyn_params: SingleIntegratorParams, cont_params: VectorParams) → PointInput¶

Implements a constant control for the single integrator dynamics

Parameters:

  • time – clock time (not used)

  • state – vehicle state (not used)

  • vec – The vector to be followed

  • dyn_params – The parameters for the dynamics

  • cont_params – The paramters for the control law
